overview: One hot afternoon in the south of France, several paths are converging towards a tragic conclusion.  Those involved are: Stéphane and Luigi, two cousins who have just emerged from adolescence; Georges, a retired old man;  Amélie, Luigi’s girlfriend; and Amélie’s mother Anne.  Little do they know how their lives, scarred by fear, humiliation and weariness, will become intertwined and propel them to a terrible outcome...
